entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More granular X.509 certificate loader #91763
    9.0.0
  • Support EventSource/event pipe in shared libraries #91762
    Future
  • CI error: System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity #91757
  • [API Proposal]: Make `string` implement `IReadOnlyList<char>` #91756
  • [mono] Use C11 atomics in atomic.h when building with MSVC #91748
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Add mono_atomic_cas_weak_TYPE functions #91747
    9.0.0
  • Consider using interceptors for IndexOfAny-like calls #91743
  • [wasm] `LowLevelPerf.GenericGenericMethod` failing #91742
  • Using [UnsafeAccessor] with a local function only fails at runtime #91740
  • [NativeAOT] Thunk mapping doesn't work on macOS/x64 with hardened runtime #91738
  • Bump iOS/tvOS minimum supported version to 12.0 #91736
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentQueueTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakesPeeks_ForceContentionWithOtherThreadsPeeking "Inconsistent LargeStruct: 1 1 1 1 1 1 0 0" #91732
  • [API Proposal]: High-performance, low-allocation convenience "writer" for Span<T> and Memory<T> #91728
  • Assert failure: !"UnwindManagedExceptionPass1: PAL_VirtualUnwind failed" #91723
  • [HTTP] Metrics test fails on Mac locally #91721
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Arm64 release JitDisasm has a lot of empty comments #91719
  • [mono] mono_thread_attach repeat hit assert #91716
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Double #91746
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 38 Regressions on 8/31/2023 1:23:15 PM #91744
    8.0.0
  • .net 8 Console ReadKey - how to set back to 'echo mode' before child process launch & exit? #91710
    Future
  • .net 8 Console.ReadKey : Better support for return Ctrl-Z, and setting SIGSTOP #91709
    Future
  • .net 8 fails to launch a child console app without terminal gibberish #91706
    Future
  • MacCatalyst/tvOS networking test failures #91705

Closed

  • Assertion failed '!"Jump into middle of try region"' in 'TestClass:Method22(byref,TestClass+S2,byref,byref,byref):TestClass+S2:this' during 'Find loops' #91108
    8.0.0
  • How to use System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl in netstandard2.0? #91729
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Deconstruct` method to `Rune` #91509
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/regressions/DD117522/Test/Test.sh #89545
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Consider switching to C11 #90404
    9.0.0
  • [libs][iOS] TimeZoneInfo StandardName/DisplayName display abbreviations instead of full name #89466
    8.0.0
  • Stopwatch.Frequency different Windows and Linux #91726
  • Build issue: NETSDK1124: Trimming assemblies requires .NET Core 3.0 or higher #91734
  • Assertion failed '(node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector64_Create) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector128_Create) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector64_CreateScalarUnsafe) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector128_CreateScalarUnsafe) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_DuplicateToVector64) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_DuplicateToVector128) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_Arm64_DuplicateToVector64) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_Arm64_DuplicateToVector128)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91336
    8.0.0
  • macOS NativeAOT Compile produces large empty __LINKEDIT block #91720
  • C# ADO.NET Transaction Scope Auto Committed Before Calling Complete() #91376
  • Assertion failed 'store->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #91443
    8.0.0
  • [iOS][tvOS] Building tests fails with "Trimming assemblies requires .NET Core 3.0 or higher" #91535
  • [Mono] Calling a virtual static method on an interface in Debug mode causes a crash #90139
    9.0.0
  • Unhandled inner exception for NativeOverlapped used for multiple operations #76060
    Future
  • High CPU usage of application hosted as a docker container #76296
    Future
  • .Net application aborts at startup with "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" on windows server - when upgrade .Net5 to .Net 6 #87937
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove "Is supported on this TFM" logic from marshalling generators and instead handle it during factory construction #91768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Metrics Feature Switch #91767
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Fix fgDebugCheckFlags checks for FTN_ADDR #91766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix analyzer failure where incorrect SemanticModel is used #91764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasi] Work arounbd WASI's mmap implementation not returning aligned m… #91761
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Split the informational version on both SemVer2 separators when calculating TFM #91760
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking-release
  • Fix whole program optimization option for Windows #91759
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Split the informational version on both SemVer2 separators when calculating TFM #91758
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/8.0] Do not throw PNSE exception from NegotiateAuthentication constructor #91753
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Switch macOS to mmap thunks like iOS platforms #91751
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added missing *Async overrides to TlsStream #91750
    area-System.Net
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a potential shutdown hang with `Environment.Exit()` on Windows depending on timing with GCs #91739
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Enable analyzer analyzers #91733
    area-Meta
  • [browser] WASM server for Blazor - multi-threading proposal #91731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix the trimming.sln after the recent rename of a test project #91730
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [LoongArch64-RISCV64] Refactor the profiler for LoongArch64 and also fix some errors for RISCV64. #91722
    community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Handle mistyped commas in morph in pre-order too #91718
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #91717
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Don't shut down event pipe in DLLs on Windows #91715
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix partial trimming of assemblies on referenced in metadata #91713
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] changes in how sampling is done for DATAS #91712
    NO-MERGE

Merged

  • Fix binder gen compile issues due to inaccessible members and identifier name clashes #91657
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono] add nullable annotation to InternalInvoke #91755
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove RCPC and RCPC2 from optimisticInstructionSet #91754
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add blazor First UI measurement #91749
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix setting EH region on new loop header blocks #91711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set DOTNET_PreferredVectorBitWidth for x86/x64 #91735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add an option to set maximum processes to run tests #91737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port the check for illegal type recursion to the EnsureLoadableType implementation #91707
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable CodeQL for jitrollingbuild pipeline #91745
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics #91489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Add Microsoft.Extensions.Options.SourceGeneration to Transport Package #91700
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Update the assert to include Vector64/Vector128 CreateScalar #91504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try fixing the new unhandled exception test #91714
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Append job attempt number to log artifact names #91658
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ENABLE_CHECKED_CASTS build and transform it into ENABLE_CHECKED_BUILDS_ option #91630
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Start vectorizing TensorPrimitives #91596
    area-System.Numerics
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement timezoneinfo functions #91458
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos
  • JIT: Handle mistyped commas in morph in pre-order too #91587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][tvOS] Fix building runtime tests on iOS-like platforms #91542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Try to disable VSIX update service and collect VS update logs #91708
    needs-area-label
  • Validate hardcoded offsets to PROFILE_PLATFORM_SPECIFIC_DATA struct #91595
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][mini] Fix gshared crash when calling svm and constrained class is interface #91667
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [LoongArch64, RISC-V] Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch for LoongArch64 and RISC-V. #91531
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Remove all uses of non `Ex` version of `LoadLibrary` API from PAL #91693
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Improve SPMI space checking calculation #91697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move CoreCLR community platforms to build with the global build template #91646
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Separate running PAL tests out to their own jobs/steps. #91643
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Is this all I need to do? #89316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Prevent other threads from writing to a session once rundown begins #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64: Use stlur for volatile stores #91553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test improvements for #8418 on CI #91694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Remove CMake version checks #91632
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Remove DebugProxy from ClaimsIdentity and ClaimsPrincipal #91680
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [browser] threads design #91696
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • SPMI: Hacky workaround for coredistools unsupported instructions #91668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Unconditionally suppress trimming warnings in HttpClientHandler #91520
    area-System.Net.Http, linkable-framework, os-ios
  • [release/8.0] Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types #91703
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91311
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, regression-from-last-release, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91690
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][infra] Fix mono-aot-cross build for linux-arm64 using biarch image #91019
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: DNER multiregs with SIMD12s #91674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][metadata] Fixes for static virtual methods with interface variance #91664
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91659
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Enable all X86Base intrinsics #91393
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • Move Native AOT outerloop tests to their own pipeline #91684
    needs-area-label
  • Improve scalability of monitored Counter / UpDownCounter #91566
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for 128-bit integers to BitConverter #91299
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Reduce IL size for `BitConverter.GetBytes` #91639
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Interest in wit-bindgen for c# #2377

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix partial munmapping #2395
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM Merge sep 23 #2396

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide an error at install time to guide customers to include --roll-forward Major in dotnet tool install #35220
  • Investigate APICompat errors caused by assembly references re-used from the right-hand side during package validation #35214
  • ASP.NET Core 3.1 get slow build on SDK 7.0.400 #35200
  • ```dotnet run``` with invalid launch profile name does not populate ```DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE``` with actual profile selected. #35197

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35223
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: resource typo #35208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • test pr for #33835 #35195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Copying the test project to a unique temporary folder is to change the hard coding of the tfm and package version #34624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35185
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Change containers publish target to require IsPublishable (and explicit SDK Container support) #34980
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Container Build: Add tar.gz (Docker Archive) file writing #35151
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Update Verify.Xunit package version #35146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create default.json file #34414
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Asp.Net FrameworkReference in BrowserRefresh #35190
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn has introduced many source-built prebuilts #69847
  • Builds not reporting source-build prebuilts as errors #69846
  • Collection expressions: interface target types should be limited to specific System.Collections.Generic interfaces #69839

Closed

  • [BUG] The IDE0022 analyzer mistakenly suggests/fixes code that includes preprocessor directives #69783
  • IsImplicit for multiple operation nodes with same syntax #22229
    Backlog
  • Follow up on isImplicit mismatch #22548
    Backlog
  • Required project reference when using transitive source generator dependencies #69668
  • Source generator - fail to generate source with message 'Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces #69819
  • Discarded constructor parameter produces diagnostic after converting to primary constructor #68869
    17.8
  • Some commonly-reported diagnostic results at suggestion level cannot be disabled #69829
    17.8
  • ??= operator doesn't prevent IDE0052 info error to be shown #66975
    18.0
  • Bump version of ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.1.0.7455 #69613
    17.8 P2
  • Cursor jumps while renaming in the editor #68374
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle non-member-overriding context in OverrideCompletion #69855
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix source build trying to consume StreamJsonRpc #69854
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Emit BeforeFieldInit flag on interfaces #69850
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, untriaged
  • Properly support (and reject) a limited set of preprocessor directive scenarios for 'use expression body'. #69849
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure location of a "simple program" type refers to a source tree #69845
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged, 17.8
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: interface target types should be limited to specific System.Collections.Generic interfaces #69842

Merged

  • Fix 'use compound coalesce' analyzer in the presence of pp directives #69851
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during ToDisplayString #69800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Include URI string when we get an exception creating a URI #69840
    Next
  • Bail out from remove unused member analyzer for ??= operator #69812
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix some issues with the MSBuild NuGet packaging #69835
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump decompiler for debugger #69772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Only sync selection when text identifier has focus in rename flyout #69825
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: type inference from spread elements #69856
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Randomize analyzer instantiation to avoid static constructor/jit contention #69838
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Update LanguageServerHost to use NamedPipe #69816
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add support for reading runsettings passed by the client #69792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix folding range bug in C# extension #69817
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle long extension invocation chains #69831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics and fix Full Solution analysis with project config changes #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Test #69814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce chance of stopping a WebApplication incorrectly by providing compiler info/warning #50578
  • [ASP.NET] Provide a sample on how to pack a website as a tool #50575
  • Provide an API for opening a new browser tab #50574
  • During shutdown of the ASP.NET host, configuration values cannot be resolved anymore #50570
  • Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.AspNetCore used deprecated NuGet packages #50569

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper #50519
  • Exceptions on AuthorizeView net8.0p7 #50129
  • Custom unhandled exception logging #50385
  • border property for img not working on chrome browser #49724
  • HTTP/2 Clients can see truncated responses despite reading above minimum data rate. #12785
    Backlog
  • QuickGrid Unable to use Length when in a TemplateColumn #49886

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50576
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking
  • Add release/8.0 to helix runs #50573
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Startup API cleanups #50571
    area-blazor
  • Update gRPC packages for .NET 8 templates #50568
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc

Merged

  • Support independently enabling hosting event counters and metrics #50565
    area-hosting, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix FileLoggerProcessorTests output path #50572
    tell-mode, area-networking, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/8.0] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2261203 #50558
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, tell-mode, 8.0-rc2
  • Update help link and aka.ms references for RDG #50542
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50530
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0-preview5 #50538
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Fix IIS OutOfProc sometimes creating multiple app instances after recycle #50535
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Support resolving IFormFile in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Error page support for Server Side Rendered Razor Component Applications #50550
    area-blazor
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2262202 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Enhanced navigation redirections. Make form enhancement opt-in. #50551
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Obsolete Router.PreferExactMatches #50545
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template #50554
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Support injecting keyed services with `[Inject]` #50561
    area-blazor
  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MauiAsset are not be copied during the Unpackaged publish #17260
  • Issues with the emulator #17259
  • Veeeery poor performance in ScrollView #17257
  • iOS: cannot set the PlatformView.BarTintColor for the SearchBar #17254

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lazy Loading without proxies documentation is not a pit of success #31659

Closed

  • Bump Cosmos to latest version on EF Core 7 #31419
  • Owned Json entity with init-only property setter results in ArgumentException in Preview 7 #31433
    8.0.0
  • 💡 Feature Request: Scaffolding models (via "DB First") can generate enums instead of a string/number if we can give the scaffold some hints #31644
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Nullable object must have a value. EF Core and OData 8 #31655
  • ComplexTypeAttribute cannot be applied to value types #31618
  • RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetDefaultTableName should return null for abstract types in a TPC hierarchy #30060
    8.0.0
  • RC1: UnreachableException when loading with proxies and a JSON-mapped complex property #31597
    8.0.0
  • Complex type columns are non-nullable in TPH when defined on derived entity type #31378
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent ordering in SQL queries generated for split query with Include #31657
  • C# Dapper Transaction Scope is not rollbacking for DB2 Provider #31590

PullRequests

Created

  • [TEST ONLY] Add tests for #30885 - DateOnly/TimeOnly with JSON exceptions in preview 4 #31663
    auto-merge
  • Set the key comparer as well as the normal comparer when mapping a primitive collection #31661

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31660
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Call appropriate assign method in JSON shaper #31651
  • Make RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetDefaultTableName return null for owned abstract types in a TPC hierarchy #31653
  • Fix to #31597 - RC1: UnreachableException when loading with proxies and a JSON-mapped complex property #31656
  • Map complex type properties to nullable columns when the complex type is declared on a derived type in TPH. #31652

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.1 to 8.2.2 #31628
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
